column4: hello everyone.. I just installed ubuntu 8.10 and I added my drivers and updated my system and now I rebooted and I can't get X to start up again
I tried envyng and it tried the -t switch and it didn't work.
has anyone had a problem with nvidia drivers ?
a lot of people have problems with geforce 2/4 's version 96 drivers and font antialiasing, but apart from this, dunno
